clinical_study.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Patients Using the Subretinal Retina Implant Alpha
clinical_study.official_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Patients Using the Subretinal Retina Implant Alpha

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a non-invasive registry to monitor the safety and efficacy of patients using the CE-certified RETINA IMPLANT Alpha.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a non-invasive registry to monitor the safety and efficacy of patients using the CE-certified RETINA IMPLANT Alpha. For Germany, it is under the exceptions mentioned in §23b MPG (Medizinproduktegesetz). Its purpose is to collect data that is created during the regular therapy with the implant. No additional examinations are performed, except a patient questionnaire.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Recording of all adverse events and serious adverse events.
Comparing measurements of retinal thickness by optical coherence tomography , in regular intervals (6 months).
Comparing measurements of retinal perfusion by fluorescence angiography, in regular intervals (6 months).
Comparing measurements of general retinal state by fundus images, in regular intervals (6 months).
Comparing measurements of intraocular pressure by tonometry, in regular intervals (6 months).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First in 2 week intervals, after 3 months in 3 month intervals for 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Measuring the visual performance by screen test battery Basic Light and Motion Test (BaLM) Basic Grating Acuity (BaGA) Visual acuity (Landolt C optotypes)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First in 2 week intervals, after 3 months in 3 month intervals for 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Measuring the visual performance by table test battery finding, locating and identifying of objects reading the time on a clock face reading letters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First in 2 week intervals, after 3 months in 3 month intervals for 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Measuring hand eye coordination by placing an object inside a shape

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First in 2 week intervals, after 3 months in 3 month intervals for 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Recording personal experiences by a questionnaire and verbally.

study_pop.textblock: All patients receiving a Retina Implant Alpha at the study site.
